intro: Gynochthodes trimera, commonly known as the slender starfish flower, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its striking, star-shaped flowers that are typically yellow or orange in color. The plant has opposite, ovate leaves that are often covered in a fine, hairy texture. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in some horticultural settings.
